attributes.action: ensure the Red Arrows fly at the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We understand that certain parties wish to ban the Red Arrows from flying at the 21012 games for being "too British" and "too militaristic".
We reject the self loathing and hatred of Britain inherent in such remarks and request that the PM calls for the Red Arrows to faly

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
